contacts.title: contacts
contacts.description: The email to which you can contact your users directly or the providers of the services you use. You can associate a description to indicate how you wish to receive communications

certified.description: Authoritative sources recognized by Interoperability have given you these certified attributes.

verified.description: At least one provider has recognized the following verified attributes for you.

activeDeclared.description: You have declared under your responsibility to possess these attributes.

revokedDeclared.title: Revoked declared attributes
revokedDeclared.description: In the past, you had these declared attributes, but have subsequently declared that you no longer have them.
revokedDeclared.noAttributesLabel: There are no revoked declared attributes
